name: Sol Traveler
description:
Lost in space on an alien spaceship, you must find your way home. 

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Look
  • Left Click - Grab/Interact
  • E - Interact with Held/Eat

Credits:

  • Nicholas McDonnell
  • Daniel Draper
  • Claire Rochelmeyer

Music by Aaron Edwards
